text:
In  /02_decoding/plot_simulated_data, the regressors are refereed as classifiers. This can be confusing. 
Is this name intended?. If not, I'd suggest to change it to regressors or estimators.
title: Change variable name in plot_simulated_data
clean_text: In 02decodingplotsimulateddata regressor refere classifi thi confus Is name intend If Id suggest chang regressor estim

text: +1 for estimators. Can you do a PR please ?
